*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Matamoros, May 31, 1833. Warning against speculation. Robertson colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p*The draft on *person_mentioned*Hebenstreit */person_mentioned*from *person_mentioned*Reynolds */person_mentioned*was neither accepted nor protested. *person_mentioned*Hebenstreit */person_mentioned*was absent and I left the draft with *person_mentioned*Mr Toler*/person_mentioned*, with directions to collect it, or if it was protested to send it to you.*/p*
*p*I wish all things to harmonise with *person_mentioned*Fisher */person_mentioned*when he arrives—he will now be usefull to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and all the past ought to be forgotten, be particular as to this point.*/p*
*p*Don't forget the strange order, that *person_mentioned*Arcia. [Arciniega]*/person_mentioned* recd, about the records—keep an [eye] to all that.*/p*
*p*You are engaging in one business [before the?] other is finished and may spoil [everything?] rush the records of the *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*. . . the testimonios and surveys etc then give it up in toto and go to the *person_mentioned*merchants */person_mentioned*occupation, but finish first and keep clear of land jobing. I am of opinion that the *location_mentioned*upper colony*/location_mentioned* will totally ruin me? in fact I have but little doubt of it, for such men and [as] *person_mentioned*Bowie */person_mentioned*etc will lead you and *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*too far into speculations*person_mentioned* B F. Smiths*/person_mentioned* cursed foolish trip has done great harm and I am sorry he ever came to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—keep clear of all speculations for the future, they are a curse to any *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and will be a very sore curse to me individually. I believe they will ruin me if they have not already done it—cursed be the hour I ever thought of applying for that *location_mentioned*upper colony*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*,*date_mentioned n="05-31-1833"> may 31, 1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*If the wind permits I shall sail *date_mentioned n="06-01-1833">tomorrow */date_mentioned*in the comet for *location_mentioned*vera cruz*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*N. B. I have unlimited con[fidence in] *person_mentioned*Felisola*/person_mentioned*—he is a good and . . . man and can be fully re[lied on].*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*.
*/div1*
